foreignData.name: Granchio delle Rovine
foreignData.text: Terraferma — Ogniqualvolta una terra entra nel campo di battaglia sotto il tuo controllo, ogni avversario macina tre carte.

foreignData.name: 遺跡ガニ

foreignData.name: Caranguejo-das-ruínas

foreignData.name: 遺跡蟹
foreignData.text: 地落～每當一個地在你的操控下進戰場時，每位對手各磨三張牌。

name: Ruin Crab
originalText: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, each opponent mills three cards.

rulings.text: A landfall ability triggers whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control for any reason. It triggers whenever you play a land, as well as whenever a spell or ability puts a land onto the battlefield under your control.
A landfall ability doesn’t trigger if a permanent already on the battlefield becomes a land.

Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, each landfall ability of the permanents you control will trigger. You can put them on the stack in any order. The last ability you put on the stack will be the first one to resolve.

text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, each opponent mills three cards. (To mill a card, a player puts the top card of their library into their graveyard.)
